metadata.dc:author: Sánchez Aragó, Sonia
metadata.dc:description: The advance directives' document involves patients in decisions related to their treatment; it promotes the principle of autonomy. Although advance directives' document has been regulated legally at national state and local levels, nursing professionals still have a huge lack of this issue. How they work directly with patients, it is important nurses have update knowledge to give support and information to the patients, with the aim ofproviding a quality care.
metadata.dc:title: La importancia del papel de enfermería ante las voluntades anticipadas.
[THE IMPORTANT ROLE OF NURSING IN ADVANCE DIRECTIVES].
